mapper.select: SELECT t1.tzw_order_id,t4.tzw_user_username, t2.tzw_item_name, t2.tzw_item_num, t3.tzw_receiver_phone, t3.tzw_receiver_address, t1.tzw_order_status, t1.tzw_order_createDate from tzw_order t1,tzw_order_item t2, tzw_order_shipping t3,tzw_user t4 where t1.tzw_user_id=t4.tzw_user_id and t3.tzw_order_shipping_id=t1.tzw_order_id AND t2.tzw_order_id=t1.tzw_order_id limit #{cpage},#{size}

SELECT t1.tzw_order_id, t1.tzw_order_address, t1.tzw_order_createDate, t1.tzw_order_updateDate, t1.tzw_order_num, t1.tzw_order_beizhu, t1.tzw_order_status, t2.tzw_user_username, t3.tzw_item_name, t2.tzw_user_phone from tzw_order t1,tzw_user t2, tzw_item t3 where t1.tzw_user_id=t2.tzw_user_id and t3.tzw_item_id=t1.tzw_item_id AND t1.tzw_order_id=#{tzw_order_id}

SELECT count(*) from tzw_order t1,tzw_order_item t2, tzw_order_shipping t3,tzw_user t4 where t1.tzw_user_id=t4.tzw_user_id and t3.tzw_order_shipping_id=t1.tzw_order_id AND t2.tzw_order_id=t1.tzw_order_id where t1.tzw_user_id=#{tzw_user_id}
